subject: Basketball (College)
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Montrezl Harrell had a career-high 22 points, and No. 13 Louisville built a 30-point first-half lead en route to an 82-58 win at Temple.
snippet: Montrezl Harrell had a career-high 22 points, and No. 13 Louisville built a 30-point first-half lead en route to an 82-58 win at Temple.
